General.Name: North Peak Resources Ltd
General.Description: North Peak Resources Ltd. engages in the exploration and development of gold and silver properties in Canada. It holds interest in the Kenogami project located to the southwest of Kirkland Lake, Ontario. The company was formerly known as Interbit Ltd. and changed its name to North Peak Resources Ltd. in June 2020. North Peak Resources Ltd. was incorporated in 2011 and is based in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: 1600, 421 - 7 Avenue SW, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2P 4K9

1.Name: Mr. Robert D. B. Suttie B.A.
